content.raw: Note that I tested heightmap caching with `use_terrain_paging` set to `true` in ogre 1.8 and 1.9 but found that gazebo crashes on startup. Same thing happens on `gazebo7` branch without changes in this PR. The original [heightmap paging PR](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/687/terrain-paging-support-for-rendering/diff) mentions that it probably only works with ogre 1.7.4
content.html: Note that I tested heightmap caching with use_terrain_paging set to true in ogre 1.8 and 1.9 but found that gazebo crashes on startup. Same thing happens on gazebo7 branch without changes in this PR. The original heightmap paging PR mentions that it probably only works with ogre 1.7.4
